DOC.brief_summary: Effect of Early management on PAin and DEpression in patients with PancreatoBiliary Cancer, EPADE-PB Purpose To determine whether early palliative care integrated with usual oncologic care with automated symptom monitoring can improve depression and pain in patients with cancer
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Early Management on PAin and DEpression in Patients With PancreatoBiliary Cancer, EPADE-PB
